job_details.Functieomschrijving: Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Research Engineer

Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of large language models (LLMs) from scratch, conducting cutting-edge research on them, and establishing responsible data governance practices. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in advancing generative AI models and their responsible development. The mention of 'LLM lab' and 'general-purpose AI models' strongly points towards this profile over an ML Engineer, which focuses more on predictive modeling and traditional ML pipelines.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'develops large language models from scratch' and 'conducts cutting-edge research on them', which directly relates to the creation and adaptation of generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: develops large language models from scratch

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies' indicates a focus on exploring and advancing AI models, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'developers who lay the foundations' and 'futureproof AI-powered experiences', suggesting the integration of AI research into practical applications and systems.
The goal to 'unlock new work experiences in the future' implies building and deploying AI-powered features into user-facing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: unlock new work experiences in the future

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'responsible data governance practices' and 'open-governance initiatives' suggests a focus on the ethical and operational aspects of deploying and managing AI models.
The team's goal is to 'futureproof AI-powered experiences', indicating an alignment of technical research with future business needs and user experiences.
